questions.question: The coverage of the Microwave Landing System in the UK extends to ... up to a height of ... and ... either side of the on course line.
questions.explanation: The Microwave Landing System (MLS) in the UK provides coverage extending to 20 NM range, up to a height of 20,000 ft, and ±40° either side of the on-course line. This provides greater flexibility than ILS for curved and segmented approaches.
